[[Image:Valysar.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of Valysar on the continent of Essos.]]
'''Valysar''' is a town in western [[Essos]]. The city is located north-west of [[Volantis]] on the western bank of the [[Rhoyne]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season2/#!/locations/volantis/ HBO viewers guide, season 2 map, Volantis entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Valysar is a vassal town of [[Volantis]]. As it is located on the western side of the river, it does not have any fear of the [[Dothraki]] or a need to pay them tribute, unlike its sister-city of [[Selhorys]] to the north. Valysar is a middling-sized town by the standards of the [[Free Cities]], but would be a small city by [[Westeros]]i standards.
